channel.title: Untitled MTP 317 revamp pk+pvm+eco server
channel.description:
Rune mtp 317 has been my favorite off all sources, I had a small part(even with my inexperience at the time) in adding additons to it. After a short time Marcbob decided to release it. Unfortunately a number of flaws existed with this source, especially later in development with the breaking of npc drops. Because of this its popularity depleted. The download links for rune mtp 317 are still around but not the originals. Fortunately I kept a backup copy of the source we were working on. It is here that I will display my developements in working with this source and the road I am traveling to make this server available for users to play on once more.
Completed In process Not started
NPC DROPS FIXED 100% New Bank interface Korasi Object clicking when right next to Glitch fixed Barrows Point System and abstract way of getting barrows Pvp artifacts working doors 1 major boss with drops Autocasting Weapon sound volume control Female infinity boot model fixed vesta/statius model ids were switched -_-? Title screen music Title screen music doesnt crash client if you log in then out Redone starter for more eco friendly As many starters per ip as you want Barrows spawn location is a multi pk spot Castle has a safe zone BankAll Working button Withdraw Bank note Prayer and hp orbs
Naming the server.... Arcane Magic-newspellbook(May not ever finish this) Casino All weapon sounds-almost done All areas music adjusting eco Crafting Smithing Thieving Boss key chest for random item-stealing this from foreverpkers and whoever they got it from Godwars-might leave out remove pointless commands Bank Worn Items
2+ more bosses Door sound defensive sound dragon defender Drink potion sound - quick Teleport sounds Slayer Magic Sounds Range Sounds Chaotic crossbow Quest for ability to make sanfews Command Interface Book Interface to help new players Misc sounds ie equipping,dropping etc. No killing same ip or no logging in with more than 1 account Follow and combat clipping? Drinking potions while following Account recovery or hacker prevention Misc quests Clue scrolls All curses
Media:
Arcane Spells that I probably wont finish
[img]http://i280.photobucket.com/albums/kk184/50percentelf/spriteupdate1.png[/img]
Similar to Pkpoints shop(was using this when npc drops werent working, may change) [img]http://i280.photobucket.com/albums/kk184/50percentelf/barrows_zps0d799e2a.png[/img]
Ill add more when I think of them, if you have suggestions leave them below. Don't suggest Chaotics, pvp armor, customs.(Already have most of this,and don't want a bunch of customs). I want content filled suggestions :D, something players get on and are like "ooo I never play servers with this!".
Just Read through some other servers in developement and I am quite impressed with the content the community produces. I have a lot of work ahead of me to catch up.

item.title: Untitled MTP 317 revamp pk+pvm+eco server
item.dc:creator: @50percentelf 50percentelf
item.description:
@50percentelf wrote:

Rune mtp 317 has been my favorite off all sources, I had a small part(even with my inexperience at the time) in adding additons to it. After a short time Marcbob decided to release it. Unfortunately a number of flaws existed with this source, especially later in development with the breaking of npc drops. Because of this its popularity depleted. The download links for rune mtp 317 are still around but not the originals. Fortunately I kept a backup copy of the source we were working on. It is here that I will display my developements in working with this source and the road I am traveling to make this server available for users to play on once more.

Completed
In process
Not started

NPC DROPS FIXED 100%
New Bank interface
Korasi
Object clicking when right next to Glitch fixed
Barrows Point System and abstract way of getting barrows
Pvp artifacts
working doors
1 major boss with drops

Female infinity boot model fixed
vesta/statius model ids were switched -_-?
Title screen music
Title screen music doesnt crash client if you log in then out
Redone starter for more eco friendly
As many starters per ip as you want
Barrows spawn location is a multi pk spot
Castle has a safe zone
BankAll Working button
Withdraw Bank note
Prayer and hp orbs

Naming the server…
Arcane Magic-newspellbook(May not ever finish this)
Casino
All weapon sounds-almost done
All areas music
adjusting eco
Crafting
Smithing
Thieving
Boss key chest for random item-stealing this from foreverpkers and whoever they got it from
Godwars-might leave out
remove pointless commands
Bank Worn Items

2+ more bosses
Door sound
defensive sound
dragon defender
Drink potion sound - quick
Teleport sounds
Slayer
Magic Sounds
Range Sounds
Chaotic crossbow
Quest for ability to make sanfews
Command Interface
Book Interface to help new players
Misc sounds ie equipping,dropping etc.
No killing same ip or no logging in with more than 1 account
Follow and combat clipping?
Drinking potions while following
Account recovery or hacker prevention
Misc quests
Clue scrolls
All curses

Similar to Pkpoints shop(was using this when npc drops werent working, may change)

Ill add more when I think of them, if you have suggestions leave them below. Don’t suggest Chaotics, pvp armor, customs.(Already have most of this,and don’t want a bunch of customs). I want content filled suggestions :D, something players get on and are like “ooo I never play servers with this!”.

Just Read through some other servers in developement and I am quite impressed with the content the community produces. I have a lot of work ahead of me to catch up.
